idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

descript.abstract: Collection of points representing flat scatters, single finds, mounds and any mixed discovery contexts from 2009 & 2011 campaign in Kazanluk
descript.purpose: For visualisation - sorted record of significant survey "objects". Aggregate from all seasons (2009-2011), useful for visualization and statistical or other analysis after additional sorting through. Caveat: naming conventions (notes) not consistent, capitals and small-case letters interchange, which makes classification a bit more time-consuming.
descript.supplinf: Points irrelevant to site data, such as children data ( daub concentrations within site, geophysics grid), points collected during RS ground control are filtered out. If you want to see complete record refer to original Team point files or KAZ_Allpoints

citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: KAZ_SitePoints

status.progress: REQUIRED: The state of the data set.
status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

theme.themekt: REQUIRED: Reference to a formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of theme keywords.
theme.themekey: REQUIRED: Common-use word or phrase used to describe the subject of the data set.

dataIdInfo.idPurp: For visualisation and analysis. Streamlined by Barbora Weissova. To be used with 09_03 spreadsheet in Oxbow publication Cleaned up record of burial mounds. Aggregate from all seasons (2009-2011), useful for visualization and statistical or other analysis after additional sorting through. Consistent dataset, labels, capitals and small-case letters.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Collection of points representing burial mounds and any mixed discovery contexts from 2009 & 2011campaign in Kazanluk
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Barbora Weissova @ 7 February 2012, 2015 Adela Sobotkova (final shapefile extraction from Site Points) in 30 Dec 2015

searchKeys.keyword: Points representing burial mounds documented during 2009-2011 seasons; Kazanlak. NEWEST

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
